      • sendAndGetReply

        public java.lang.String sendAndGetReply(java.lang.String message)
        Sends the given message and returns the reply. This method throws an exception if there is not received a reply within the timeout.
        Parameters:
        message -
        Returns:
        the reply of the given message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if this zeta end point is stopped.
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if an error occurs by trying to send the message.
